TEXT.TITLE: MEASUREX CORP <MX> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 34 cts vs 27 cts Qtrly div six cts vs 4.5 cts prior Net 6,448,000 vs 4,969,000 Revs 51.1 mln vs 44.7 mln Avg shrs 19.1 mln vs 18.7 mln NOTE: pay for dividend was March 11 to shareholders of record on Feb 20. Reuter
